Merchant of Mammon: Ancient adena is the currency that was used during the Elmoreden Empire. It was minuted from gold of the highest purity, of a much higher quality than the coins used today. It is said that the emblem on the back of the coins possesses a mysterious power... The Lords of Dawn and the Revolutionaries of Dusk are given bonuses in ancient adena. Sell them *seal stones* and they'll pay for them with ancient adena. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|Go Back]
